thread.title: Spotify’s IPO in New York Puts European Tech Sector in Spotlight

author: Sam Schechner
title: Spotify’s IPO in New York Puts European Tech Sector in Spotlight
text:
PARIS—The market has spoken: Europe is home to the globe’s newest tech giant.
European tech investors and executives cheered Wednesday after Spotify Technology SA burst onto the public markets Tuesday in New York with a valuation above $26 billion. That made the Swedish firm one of the largest tech companies in Europe and represented one of the best public trading debuts for any tech firm.
For...
